title: Produktägare Digital användarupplevelse
description:
Vill du vara med och bidra till att skapa Sveriges bästa hälso-och sjukvård och ett hållbart samhälle med tillväxt i hela Västra Götaland? Västra Götalandsregionen är Sveriges största offentliga arbetsgivare med ambitionen att bli Sveriges bästa offentliga arbetsgivare. Hos oss får du chansen att utföra ett meningsfullt arbete för samhället och bidra till Västra Götalandsregionens vision ”det goda livet”. På Koncernkontoret arbetar vi dagligen med att göra skillnad för patienter, medarbetare, besökare och invånare.


Vi söker en engagerad och kunnig person för att ta rollen som Ansvarig för Digital användarupplevelse (UX). Du kommer att spela en central roll i att förbättra och optimera den digitala arbetsmiljön för våra över 60 000 anställda inom Västra Götalandsregionen. Din uppgift blir att säkerställa en smidig och effektiv digital upplevelse för våra medarbetare, från första dagen de börjar hos oss, genom hela deras anställning, och fram till avvecklingen av deras digitala resurser den dag de avslutar sin anställning (värdeströmmen för medarbetare) utifrån behov och processer främst definierade av HR men även andra. Ta chansen och sök dig till en av Sveriges största arbetsgivare.

**Ditt uppdrag**  

Som Produktägare för Digital Användarupplevelse kommer du att vara en viktig del i att förbättra och optimera den digitala arbetsmiljön för våra anställda inom Västra Götalandsregionen. Ditt uppdrag är att säkerställa en smidig och effektiv digital upplevelse för våra medarbetare genom hela deras anställning, från början till slut. Arbetet innebär tät dialog med kravställande verksamhet och stora delar av Koncernstab digitalisering. Dina huvudsakliga ansvarsområden inkluderar:

* **Maximera värdet av IT-Tjänsten ”Användartjänst”:** Produktansvar för denna grundläggande IT-tjänst som är utformad för att täcka alla våra användares grundläggande IT-behov.
* **Onboarding: Onboarding:** Skapa värde för nyanställda genom att säkerställa att de snabbt får sina digitala identiteter, nödvändiga behörigheter, e-post och grundläggande applikationer. Ge nyanställda ett varmt välkomnande med ett paket av digitala verktyg anpassade efter deras roller inom regionen, vilket gör att de kan komma igång effektivt och känna sig värdefulla från första dagen.
* **Löpande Support och Förbättring:** Skapa förutsättningar för att supportteamet ska kunna ge utmärkt stöd där det behövs, samt säkerställa nödvändigt användarstöd för att öka användarens adoption av digitala verktyg. Du kommer att ansvara för att ta emot och analysera feedback från användare samt dataanalys för att identifiera förbättringsområden och implementera dessa förbättringar som direkt ökar medarbetarnas produktivitet och nöjdhet.
* **Användarcentrerad Design (UX):** Etablera och förvalta användarresor baserat på olika yrkesgrupper och behov. Samarbeta brett inom organisationen för att säkerställa användarvänliga och intuitiva digitala lösningar.
* **Offboarding:** Utveckla och implementera processer för en smidig och säker avveckling av medarbetares digitala identiteter och tillgångar vid anställningens slut.

**Vad kan vi erbjuda dig?**  

Vi erbjuder dig möjligheten att göra en verklig skillnad i arbetslivet för våra medarbetare inom Västra Götalandsregionen. Du kommer att arbeta i ett dynamiskt och stödjande arbetsklimat med många kollegor som stöttar dig i ditt uppdrag. Dessutom får du:

* **Personlig och Professionell Utveckling:** Tillgång till utbildning och utvecklingsmöjligheter för att växa i din roll.
* **Påverkan:** En viktig roll i vår digitaliseringsresa där din insats direkt bidrar till förbättrad vårdkvalitet och patientupplevelse.
* **Flexibilitet och Stöd:** Ett flexibelt arbetsklimat med möjligheter att arbeta självständigt och tvärfunktionellt.
* **Flexibla arbetsformer**: Det finns möjlighet att kombinera arbete från våra kontor och på distans.

**För att lyckas i rollen behöver du:**

* **Erfarenhet som produktägare:** Du har erfarenhet av att leda produktutveckling, prioritera backloggen och säkerställa att teamet levererar värde.
* **Erfarenhet inom UX-design:** Särskilt med fokus på användarupplevelse inom stora organisationer.
* **Kunskap om digitala verktyg och plattformar:** Speciellt de som används inom hälso- och sjukvård.
* **Erfarenhet av användarcentrerade designmetoder:** Du har arbetat med att ta fram värdeerbjudanden och kundprofiler.
* **Stark analytisk förmåga:** Erfarenhet av att använda data för att driva förbättringar.
* **Utmärkta kommunikations- och samarbetsförmågor:** Förmåga att arbeta tvärfunktionellt och kommunicera effektivt med olika delar av organisationen.
* **Stark drivkraft och förmåga att arbeta självständigt:** Du är proaktiv och tar initiativ för att driva förbättringar och förändringar.

**Meriterande**:

* **Erfarenhet inom hälso- och sjukvårdssektorn:** Kännedom om de specifika utmaningarna och behoven inom denna sektor.
* **Förståelse för ekonomi och budgetplanering:** Du kan planera och följa upp budgetar samt förstå de ekonomiska aspekterna av produktutveckling.
* **Erfarenhet av stora digitaliseringsprojekt:** Att ha lett eller deltagit i omfattande projekt inom digital transformation.
* **Certifieringar inom agila metoder: Till exempel Scrum, SAFe eller liknande.**


Det är viktigt för oss att du kan arbeta utifrån vår värdegrund:

* Tillsammans gör vi varandra framgångsrika.
* Vi lyssnar in. Vi lyssnar av.
* Feedback bidrar till vår utveckling.

**Övrigt**  

Tjänsten kan komma att säkerhetsklassas.


Som en av Sveriges största arbetsgivare kan vi erbjuda rätt person goda karriär- och utvecklingsmöjligheter.


Vi eftersträvar jämlikhet för alla medarbetare, att de trivs på arbetsplatsen och värnar om en god balans mellan arbetsliv och privatliv.


Läs mer om vår verksamhet här: http://www.vgregion.se/om-vgr/


Intervjuer kommer att hållas vecka 39.


Om Västra GötalandsregionenVästra Götalandsregionen finns till för människorna i Västra Götaland. Vi ser till att det finns god hälso- och sjukvård för alla. Vi arbetar för en hållbar utveckling och tillväxt, bra miljö, förbättrad folkhälsa, ett rikt kulturliv och goda kommunikationer i hela Västra Götaland.Västra Götalandsregionen arbetar aktivt för att digitalisera fler arbetssätt. För att vara en del av den digitala omvandlingen har du med dig grundläggande färdigheter och kan använda digitala verktyg och tjänster. Du kan söka information, kommunicera, interagera digitalt, är riskmedveten och har motivation att delta i utvecklingen för att lära nytt.Västra Götalandsregionen krigsplacerar alla tillsvidareanställda medarbetare. Vill du veta mer om Västra Götalandsregionen kan du besöka vår introduktion till nya medarbetare på länken www.vgregion,se/introduktion. Du kan även läsa mer i presentation om Lön, ersättning och förmåner – det här får du som medarbetare i VGR. AnsökanVästra Götalandsregionen ser helst att du registrerar din ansökan via rekryteringssystemet. Om du som sökande har frågor om den utannonserade tjänsten eller av särskilda och speciella skäl inte kan registrera dina uppgifter i ett offentligt system - kontakta kontaktperson för respektive annons. Till bemannings-, förmedlings- och rekryteringsföretag och till dig som är försäljare:Vi undanber oss vänligen men bestämt direktkontakt med bemannings-, förmedlings- och rekryteringsföretag samt andra externa aktörer och försäljare av ytterligare jobbannonser. Västra Götalandsregionen har upphandlade avtal.

title: UX Domain Lead
description:
Transport is at the core of modern society. Imagine using your expertise to shape sustainable transport solutions for the future? If you seek to make a difference on a global scale, working with next-gen technologies and the sharpest collaborative teams, then we could be a perfect match.

**Who are you and how can you make an inpact?**
-----------------------------------------------


You are a seriously experienced design leader with passion for incorporating human-centered perspectives into digital product and service visions and strategies, emphasizing an end-to-end journey mindset. You are passionate about making sure that UX is a consistent part of the development process, throughout the digital product and service lifecycle. You see it as a personal mission to drive UX maturity, increase the wider organization’s understanding of UX and how and when to employ UX resources and methods in the service of business goals.  

  

You are well-versed in design methods and best practices, across multiple disciplines like Service Design, UX research, & Interaction Design. You are a dedicated specialist who likes to inspire and drive positive change by identifying and prioritizing roadblocks and untapped opportunities for increased efficiency, effectiveness, collaboration and alignment across many teams and individuals. You enjoy connecting to people, you listen to understand, and you identify gaps and iterate upon solutions continuously.  

You are comfortable facilitating a complex stakeholder landscape and at ease within a multifunctional leadership team, knowing how to contribute beyond own area of responsibility.  

You take pride in making sure that UX is a consistent part of the development process, throughout the product and service lifecycle by:

  

* Actively work to ensure well-integrated UX design in stable teams framework
* Aligning UX across delivery areas to enhance the end-to-end journey perspective
* Ensuring that UX designers meet the needs of the delivery areas and/or strategic initiatives – such as identifying team challenges, support both individual & team coaching, and that the right competence mix is at play to drive both innovation, feature upgrades and maintenance within a product context.
* You evangelize good UX practices and you know that design can be democratized and scale beyond designers.
**This is us, your new colleagues**
-----------------------------------


The User Experience Design Chapter in Digital Delivery collaborates with other parts of the organization, to foster an environment where ideas, thoughts and opinions can be shared. We are team players with common ambitions, and we win together by uncovering user needs through collected data and inputs to improve the usability of products and services across the Volvo Group. Our UX Design Chapter team are tasked with securing coherent and cohesive user experience, interaction and visual treatment across products and services, considering a cohesive holistic experience that is findable, credible, accessible, useful, useable, and desirable.

**Ready to shape tomorrow’s society together with us?**
-------------------------------------------------------


Are you as passionate about making an impact by design as we are? Are you thriving in the orchestration and facilitation of business, people, and processes, in order to amplify the value of design at scale? Are you keen to share your in-depth experiences and foster an environment where ideas, thoughts and opinions can be shared? With us all of this happens!

  

We value your data privacy and therefore do not accept applications via mail.

 **Who we are and what we believe in**  

Our focus on Inclusion, Diversity, and Equity allows each of us the opportunity to bring our full authentic self to work and thrive by providing a safe and supportive environment, free of harassment and discrimination. We are committed to removing the barriers to entry, which is why we ask that even if you feel you may not meet every qualification on the job description, please apply and let us decide.

  

Applying to this job offers you the opportunity to join **Volvo Group**. Every day, across the globe, our trucks, buses, engines, construction equipment, financial services, and solutions make modern life possible. We are almost 100,000 people empowered to shape the future landscape of efficient, safe and sustainable transport solutions. Fulfilling our mission creates countless career opportunities for talents with sharp minds and passion across the group’s leading brands and entities.

 **Group Digital & IT** is the hub for digital development within Volvo Group. Imagine yourself working with cutting-edge technologies in a global team, represented in more than 30 countries. We are dedicated to leading the way of tomorrow’s transport solutions, guided by a strong customer mindset and high level of curiosity, both as individuals and as a team. Here, you will thrive in your career in an environment where your voice is heard and your ideas matter.
company_description: Every day, we work with some of the sharpest and most creative brains in our field to leave our society in better shape for the next generation.

title: Senior Frontend Engineer (Growth)
description:
### **About us**


Soundtrack Your Brand is a B2B scale-up company providing music streaming services to more than 70,000 businesses in over 70 countries, from the café round the corner to bigger brands like Joe & The Juice, Toni & Guy and TAG Heuer.


The company consists of 80+ talented, motivated and humble employees. We believe in product-led growth, where the product is the primary driver of customer acquisition, conversion and expansion. Our headquarters are located in central Stockholm (Odenplan).

### **The role**


As a senior frontend engineer in the Growth team, you’ll be working on a wide range of user-centric projects together with other engineers, product owners, UI/UX designers, marketing specialists, researchers, and analysts.


The Growth team at Soundtrack is an autonomous and cross-disciplinary team, responsible for attracting new customers and onboarding them. Our main goal is to help as many new users as possible to start using and enjoying our service. This means we’re responsible for our website, signup, and onboarding experience, spanning across our storefront and apps (web, mobile, and desktop).

  

Your primary focus will be to work on new features and continuous improvements for our storefront and apps built on Next.js / React (written in TypeScript). We are a data-driven team and will continuously iterate based on insights, A/B testing and qualitative user feedback. Ideas can come from anyone, data is the final judge.


You can check out our storefront and sign up for a free trial to get a first-hand experience of what you will be working on.

### **Responsibilities**

* Building, releasing and continuously improving existing features together with UI/UX designers, researchers and analysts.
* Developing and maintaining consistent and reusable UI components/libraries used by multiple teams
* Contribute to the team’s vision, strategy and agenda
* Helping the team grow as a whole by sharing knowledge and lifting each other up

### **About you**


We're always looking to work with people who are friendly, professional, humble, open, and with a passion for design and details. You are probably not a stranger to describing yourself as:

* Self-sustaining – you can work independently, taking initiatives and planning your own time
* Curious – you enjoy learning new things to grow both professionally as well as on a personal level
* A good communicator – you enjoy discussing different solutions and strategies for technical challenges
* Agile – you feel comfortable in a dynamic environment where focus lies in what’s important here and now, with the ability to realize when it's time to change the game plan and when to stick to it
* Humble – you are an open person, you say what you mean and mean what you say
* Street smart – crafty, able to build solutions with limited resources

Eagle eyes * - has an eye for detail, and notices the smaller things others may not

### **Mandatory requirements**

* Well-versed in web development
* Strong proficiency in CSS
* Strong proficiency in TypeScript/JavaScript
* Worked with a JS framework such as Next.js, React, Angular or Vue.js
* Experienced with Git or another distributed source management system

### **Advantageous experience (not required)**

* General interest in music and/or music technology
* Experience working with design systems and/or larger CSS codebases
* Experience working with experimentation
* iOS, Android and/or Electron app development
* GraphQL APIs and libraries (we use Apollo)
* Automated testing (especially front-end)
* Basic knowledge of functional programming
* Front-end development/build pipelines using Webpack/Rollup or similar

### **Employee benefits**

* You have the freedom to decide where you work the best with our Work From Anywhere program with a one-off setup bonus included
* Generous pension plan
* Yearly budget for health, wellness and personal development
* Laptop and mobile phone of your choice with included cellular subscription
* Regular social activities such as team events, meet ups, after works and off-sites
* Daily breakfast served at the office

title: UX/UI Designer   Intern
description:
We are a pioneering technology company harnessing the power of machine learning and advanced research to deliver exceptional augmented reality (AR) solutions for industrial enterprises.
 



  





 Our innovative AR technology revolutionizes traditional work methods, inspiring new ways of thinking and unlocking groundbreaking solutions that were previously beyond reach in industry and machine operations.
 



  





 You will be a part of the Design team.
 



  





 In your role, you will be a part of shaping our future product with focus on our application for both Mobile devices and Head mounted XR glasses.
 



  





  





**You will among other things be work with:** 




  




* Be involved in all stages of the design process within projects; from research, workshops, idea generation, concepts to prototypes and delivery of design.
* Create marketing content and be a part of taking our product to market.
* Create interaction design through customer journeys, sketches, wireframes and prototypes based on insights.
* Use creative tools like Figma and other suitable design software in the XR space.
* Conducting deep interviews and workshops for user research and product testing.
* Monitor and design the interface for head-mounted XR glasses and how the user should integrate with the software (e.g. Hand movements, eye tracking, etc.)



  





**To succeed in this role, you should have** 




  




* Previous of relevant work experience in UX/UI and
 **XR Design** 
 (
 **Meritorious)**
* An ability to easily communicate and work with others in teams, both with colleagues and customers.
* A self-propelled working method
* An ability to choose the tools and methods that best suit each specific situation.
* A user-focused mindset – a passionate drive for understanding and meeting user needs.
* Experience with Figma
* Open mindset to try new working methods and software tools that just launched on the market.



  





**What we offer** 



* Practical experience of e.g. product development in the AR-Space 🕵️
* Opportunity to contribute directly to the growth of an exciting Startup 💪
* Remote work and flex Office spaces 👩‍💻
* Freedom under own responsibility 🤓
* Strategic work and planning 📊
* Be part of a product launch 🚀



  





**This is a unpaid internship initially**

title: UX/UI Designer
description:
**UX/UI Designer Job Ad**
**Company:** 
 Metrea Simulations
   

  

**Location:** 
 Stockholm
   

  

**Position:** 
 UX/UI Designer
   

  

**About Us**
 Metrea Simulations is at the forefront of flight simulation and services, blending physics, engineering, and artistry to create the most realistic and immersive training experiences. Our cutting-edge technologies offer efficient training, design, development, and tactical analysis across the aviation sector. Our core strength lies in advanced AI, flight, and sensor modeling, which enable us to deliver next-generation augmented reality products and services.
   

  

**About The Role**
 We are seeking a dedicated UX/UI Designer to lead the design efforts for our next-generation professional military simulation software, NOR. This role requires a collaborative team player who thrives in a multidisciplinary environment and can work independently. You will be responsible for formulating, presenting, and iterating on designs, and evaluating their effectiveness post-implementation.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Lead UX/UI design across all Metrea Simulations (MSIM) solutions.
* Collaborate closely with design, tech, and art teams to ensure UI meets both functional and aesthetic standards.
* Ensure MSIM software is intuitive, user-friendly, and easy to understand.


**Skills And Requirements**
* Proven experience designing UX for PC software, such as professional tools or strategy games.
* Passion for software development and creating exceptional user experiences.
* Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
* Excellent interpersonal skills, with the ability to clearly communicate design concepts to non-design team members.
* Strong organizational skills, capable of planning, prioritizing, and managing your design workload independently.


**Preferred Additional Skills**
* Experience with Unreal Engine.
* Passion for military-themed games and simulations.
* Interest in strategy/map games.
* Military experience, especially in aviation.
* Experience with mission planning or management systems.
* Background in the video game industry.
* Experience working with international teams.
* Additional language skills (e.g., Swedish, Polish, German).


**Why Join Us**
* Work on cutting-edge simulation technology.
* Be part of a dynamic and innovative team.
* Opportunities for professional growth and development.
* Contribute to products that make a significant impact in the aviation sector.


**How To Apply**
 Submit your resume, portfolio, and a cover letter detailing your relevant experience and why you’re passionate about this role
   

  

 Metrea Simulations is an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees.

title: Talented and creative designers
description:
**Join Qvik to create innovative digital solutions for top clients in a supportive, low-hierarchy culture with competitive pay, great benefits, and plenty of growth opportunities.** 




  





 We are looking for Swedish speaking and experienced designers to our team who is interested in designing the best consumer services regardless of device. You are an experienced UX-, UI- or service designer. You have been familiar with the methods of developing digital services for several years and the results of their application are also reflected in your portfolio.
 



  





**Typical day at Qvik** 




 At Qvik, every day of your work is guaranteed to be different. When it comes to work tasks, the variation can be found in the smaller daily development work right up to encourage with other designers in changed line-ups. Qvik is a design-conscious consulting company whose designers mostly work with customer projects in UX / UI design assignments together with developers.
 



  





 The role as experienced designers requires the courage to deal with problems and the ability to incorporate the smartest working methods into the work. Your days are primarily spent on a wide range of customer work, but also on mentoring younger designers and assisting, for example, sales work.
 



 Our customers' starting points and goals for our projects vary greatly; sometimes we design Sprint-type studio projects based on concept ideas, while sometimes it is our responsibility to improve the customer experience and profitability of services that have been in operation for several years.
 



  





 Various user-involved design and research methods, as well as the versatile use of design tools, are also an integral part of our worksheet.
 



  





**More about you** 




 You collaborate effortlessly in multidisciplinary teams with software developers, product owners, analysts and other designers. Various complex design assignments are easy for you and you can share the responsibility with other team members.
 



  





 In addition to design, you are interested in learning business skills or maybe you already have them. Knowledge of different software development techniques can also be useful for you. However, it is good to know agile working methods as part of the development of digital services. Organising targeted workshops face to face or at a distance is familiar to you. Here, too, there are opportunities to learn and grow.
 



  





 Our design team has joint learning and knowledge sessions on a weekly basis, and you also value an interest in continuous improvement and sharing lessons with others.
 



 Previous experience of working as a consultant and developing consumer products will definitely help you move even faster forward in the assignment.
 



  





 You need to be Swedish speaking for this role.
 



  





**Let me tell you more about Qvik** 




 We are currently a small and growing company in Stockholm, with a bigger mother company in Helsinki, Finland. If you want to be part of a growing, ambitious, cross nordic company in the heart of Stockholm, Qvik is the place for you.
 



  





 Qvik is best known for its consumer services. Our customer base includes many well-known and award-winning companies. We keep our senses fresh by also working regularly with the latest and most interesting startups.There is a good spirit in our work community: factors help and encourage each other. Join Qvik Sweden's development-oriented team of designers, where support, lessons and the latest insights are actively shared.
 



  





 Employee benefits are comprehensive. You can choose the tools yourself, and you also have a good equipment budget. In addition to training, you can sharpen your own skills at Qvik in professional guilds and try new leisure activities through various hobby clubs. In addition, we invest in Qvik's well-being of people by offering more comprehensive health services and insurance than usual, as well as support in various careers and everyday life.

title: Junior produktägare inom e-handel till Gårdssällskapet!
description:
Gårdssällskapet grundades 2013 och erbjuder ekologiskt, småskaligt och vilt producerat kött direkt från gården hem till dörren. De fokuserar på personlig service och hög kvalitet, där majoriteten av försäljningen sker via e-handel med prenumeration på Stamkundslådan. Gårdssällskapet köper direkt från den ekologiska gården, styckar i egen regi innan vi levererar ut till konsument. På huvudkontoret arbetar idag runt 20 personer, hela bolaget har runt 32 anställda. I och med den tillväxtresa Gårdssällskapet befinner sig i får du verkligen möjligheten att påverka och göra skillnad! Låter det som något för dig? Läs vidare!
 



  

**Företag :**
 Gårdssällskapet AB
 



  

**Plats :**
 Solna
 



  

**Jobbkategori :**
 IT
 



  

**Omfattning :**
 Heltid
 



  

**Startdatum :**
 Enligt överenskommelse
 



  

**Typ av uppdrag :**
 Rekrytering
   




**Om tjänsten**

 Gårdssällskapets e-handel bär en central del i försäljningen och det är av stor vikt att den hela tiden utvecklas för att möta kundernas behov och förväntningar. Som produktägare ansvarar du för att kravställa utvecklingsärenden och diskutera idéer om hur ni kan förbättra e-handelsplattformen ur både ett tekniskt och grafiskt perspektiv. Du analyserar kund- och försäljningsdata, säkerställer att sajten är uppdaterad och driver projekt inom CRO, SEO och UX. Du jobbar nära din närmaste chef, Martina Uhrstedt (Head of Sales), IT och Marknad.
 


  


  

**Några ord från din framtida närmsta chef**



  


 "Hej! Jag heter Martina och är säljchef på Gårdssällskapet. Under min korta tid här har jag varit med och förverkligat spännande projekt i en öppen och familjär atmosfär som betytt mycket för våra kunder och för vår försäljning. Som chef vill jag ge dig samma möjlighet att driva på inom ditt arbetsområde och få ett kvitto på det du gör. Vi jobbar med ekologiska produkter som vi är stolta över, och du får vara med och förbättra vår e-handel både tekniskt och grafiskt. Som produktägare ansvarar du för kravställning, att vår sajt är uppdaterad, och du analyserar data för att hitta förbättringsområden. Jag ser fram emot att arbeta tillsammans med dig!"
 


  


  

**Du erbjuds**



  

  
* Arbete i ett bolag som satsar på att växa
  
* En möjlighet att påverka och bidra med dina kunskaper
  
* Arbete i ett dynamiskt och personligt bolag
  
* Tjänstepension, 5000 kr i friskvårdsbidrag, förmånligt pris på Gårdssällskapets produkter, dator & telefon m.m.
  


  


  

**Arbetsuppgifter**



  


 Du kommer att arbeta i en bred roll som junior produktägare med allt från att samla in och prioritera utvecklingsbehov från säljavdelningen, testa funktioner i kundresan efter releaser, hantera produkter i e-handeln, ta fram och analysera försäljningssiffror och ge förslag på förbättring inom sortimentet/kunderbjudandet. Fokuset är framförallt att jobba med e-handeln och systemen ur ett tekniskt perspektiv där du har systemansvar för verktyg som GA4, Tag Manager, Merchant Center, Cookie consent-modul m.fl. Du arbetar aktivt med analyser av webbplatsen och kundbeteenden och proaktivt lyfter förbättringsområden.
 


  


 Vidare kommer du exempelvis…
 


  

  
* Säkerställa efterlevnad av gällande regler och best practice för en e-handel
  
* Löpande rapportera försäljningsstatistik och ansvar för uppsättning av dashboards i Looker Studio
  
* Uppdatera hemsidans innehåll som inte faller hos Marknad eller Kundservice
  
* Ansvara för arbetsflödet med produkter online (via Trello)
   

 När tillfälle ges kommer du att fördjupa dig inom olika analysområden där utgångspunkten är att dina projekt ska assistera till företagets långsiktiga mål inom exempelvis CRO, SEO och kundlojalitet.
  

  


**Vi söker dig som**

 I denna rekrytering kommer vi lägga stor vikt vid dig som person och ditt intresse för tjänsten och Gårdssällskapet som företag. Vi söker dig som är en lagspelare och som vill jobba brett, du är självgående och trivs i en säljdriven organisation och har ett stort intresse för att samarbeta med såväl IT som marknad för att nå de bästa lösningarna tillsammans. Vi ser även att du är flexibel och har en förmåga att anpassa dig efter nya förutsättningar och är proaktiv i ditt problemlösande.
 


  


 Utöver det har du…
 


  

  
* Minst 2 års arbetslivserfarenhet inom e-handel där du arbetat med liknande arbetsuppgifter
  
* Har arbetat administrativt med en e-handelsplattform och verktyg likt GA4
  


  

  
* Är van kravställare av utvecklingsärenden och har förståelse för teknisk SEO
  


  

  
* Duktig på att ta fram, hantera och analysera data
  
* Har mycket goda kunskaper i svenska då det är det primära arbetsspråket
  


  


  

**Övrigt information**



  

  
* Start: enligt överenskommelse
  
* Omfattning: heltid
  
* Placering: Solna, möjlighet till remotearbete ett par dagar i veckan
  
* Rekryteringsprocessen hanteras av Academic Work och alla frågor kring processen hanteras av Academic Work.
  
* Kontaktuppgifter: Ansvarig rekryteringskonsult Johanna Sörell, johanna.sorell@academicwork.se samt rekryteringskoordinator Minna Loosaar, minna.loosaar@academicwork.se
  


  

  

**Vår rekryteringsprocess**
  


 Denna rekryteringsprocess hanteras av Academic Work och vår kunds önskemål är att alla frågor rörande tjänsten skickas till Academic Work.
 


  


 Vi tillämpar löpande urval och annonsen kan därmed komma att tas ned innan sista ansökningsdag om det är så att vi har gått vidare till urvals- och intervjufas. Rekryteringsprocessen innehåller två urvalstest: ett personlighetstest och ett test i kognitiv förmåga. Testerna är ett verktyg för att kunna hitta den kandidat med högst potential för tjänsten samt främja jämlikhet, mångfald och en rättvis rekryteringsprocess.
   




**Gårdssällskapet AB**

 Läs mer om Gårdssällskapet på deras hemsida: https://www.gardssallskapet.se/
   




**Bli direktrekryterad till Gårdssällskapet AB**

 Detta är en direktrekrytering, vilket betyder att den kandidat som får tjänsten blir direktanställd av kundföretaget. Rekryteringsprocessen hanteras av Academic Work.
   




**Har du frågor om tjänsten?**

 Johanna Sörell eller någon av kollegorna i rekryteringsteamet svarar dig gärna på stv3@academicwork.se Ange annons-ID i ditt mail: 15104938

title: Machine Learning Engineer
description:
Join VNTRS on our mission to transform innovative ideas into successful companies. Unlike typical consultants, we are hands-on partners sharing both risks and successes with our clients. With a dedicated team of over 40 experts in Stockholm, Tallinn, and Helsinki, we are looking to expand our technical prowess by adding a skilled Machine learning engineer to spearhead our development projects and contribute to our technological strategy.
   

  

**About The Role**
 As our Machine learning engineer, you'll play a crucial role in guiding our organization through the fast-changing AI landscape. Working within our Tech Forum, you will collaborate with a dynamic group of more than 20 professionals, including full-stack developers, DevOps engineers, and architects.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Design, develop, and implement machine learning models and AI solutions to address complex business problems
* Actively contribute to the VNTRS Tech Forum by sharing AI/ML insights, setting technical standards, and participating in strategic planning
* Work closely with the Head of Tech to align AI initiatives with company objectives and ensure ethical AI practices
* Lead end-to-end machine learning projects, from data collection and preprocessing to model deployment and monitoring
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams to integrate AI solutions into existing products and workflows
* Represent VNTRS at industry events, showcasing our AI capabilities and fostering connections in the ML community


**Qualifications**
* Strong technical background with expertise in machine learning, deep learning, and AI technologies
* Proficiency in Python and experience with ML frameworks such as TensorFlow, PyTorch, or Scikit-learn
* Familiarity with cloud-based ML services
* Experience with big data technologies and data visualization tools
* Excellent problem-solving skills and the ability to work in a fast-paced, innovative environment
* Strong communication skills and the ability to explain complex ML concepts to both technical and non-technical stakeholders
* Experience with DevOps practices and MLOps tools for model deployment and monitoring
* Previous experience in a technical consulting role or a senior position within a tech startup or scaleup is preferred


 Why VNTRS?
   

  

 By joining VNTRS, you'll be part of an environment that values innovation, partnership, and shared success. We offer significant growth opportunities and the chance to be at the forefront of technological advancements in a collaborative and dynamic setting.
   

  

**Application**
 If you're ready to play a key role in VNTRS's tech revolution, we want to hear from you. Apply now to contribute to the future success of VNTRS and our clients.
   

  

 VNTRS is a venture studio that helps entrepreneurs and large corporations to build innovative digital products and services. In some cases we invest part of our fee in exchange for equity, so-called sweat equity investments.
   

  

 Our team consists of software developers, UI/UX designers, product and project managers, brand experts, and growth specialists.

title: Frilansande content creator
description:
Vi är nu i behov av att utöka vårt nätverk och söker fler erfarna frilansare med djup expertis inom digital kommunikation för konsultuppdrag. Omfattningen kan vara såväl hel- som deltid och uppdragens längd och karaktär varierar i stort.
 



  





**Vem vi tror att du är** 




 Du är en skicklig kommunikatör med minst tre års arbetslivserfarenhet och med vana av att arbeta i många olika digitala kanaler och projekt. Du ska helst ha erfarenhet av tidigare konsultarbete och kanske har du haft roller som digital strateg, webbredaktör, content manager, digital copy, UX-writer eller SoMe-specialist. Eller så är du en spetsig copywriter, specialiserad på ett främmande språk.
 



 Du är en digital doer med en strategisk ådra och med din erfarenhet i ryggen är du självgående och förstår större organisationer och komplexa uppdrag: du tar gärna ansvar och är bekväm med att spela en viktig roll i ett kommunikations- eller projektteam. Är din specialitet copywriting på ett främmande språk på en professionell nivå är det också meriterande.
 



 Vi ser att du har vana av att arbeta insikts- och datadrivet mot uppsatta kommunikationsmål och med fokus på kundvärde, laganda och självledarskap. Du har en stark inre nyfikenhet och vill tillämpa dina kunskaper i nya sammanhang och tillsammans med andra i nya team.
 



 Du har möjlighet att fakturera via eget bolag eller ta en projektanställning hos oss.
 



  





**På våra uppdrag kan du förvänta dig arbetsuppgifter som att:** 



* Planera, koordinera och ansvara för våra kunders närvaro i digitala kanaler
* Producera innehåll optimerat för digitala kanaler samt publicera, följa upp och optimera
* Agera rådgivare och expert i frågor som rör digital kommunikation
* Medverka i digitala projekt såväl som löpande kampanjarbete eller optimering av kundens digitala närvaro



  





 Anslut dig till vårt nätverk genom att skicka in din ansökan med CV och personligt brev, gärna med länk till din LinkedIn-profil.
 



  





**Om företaget** 




 Hos Curious Mind hittar du ett 50 tal innehållskonsulter som varje dag hjälper företag runt om i Norden att skapa lönsamma affärer genom digital kommunikation. Sedan våren 2022 är vi en del av byrågruppen ARC Arise Consulting Group med ambitionen att skapa positiv förändring och långsiktigt värde för våra kunder och deras digitala affärer. Bland våra många samarbeten finns kunder som Marshall, Polestar, Försäkringskassan, ICA och Systembolaget. Curious Mind har drygt 50 anställda och delar kontor med övriga systerbyråer inom ARC i moderna lokaler i Stockholm city. Hos oss får du ett omväxlande yrkesliv på ett bolag som värdesätter kompetens, personlighet och social gemenskap. Är du nyfiken och drivs av utveckling är vi rätt plats för dig. Här kan du läsa mer om
 
 Curious Mind
 
 och
 
 Eidra
 
 .

title: Technical writer
description:
*Boule Diagnostics AB är ett globalt diagnostikbolag som utvecklar, tillverkar och säljer system och förbrukningsvaror för blodcellräkning (hematologi). Bolaget riktar sig främst till små och medelstora sjukhus, kliniker och laboratorier samt till andra diagnostikbolag inom såväl human- som veterinärhematologi. Verksamheten bedrivs genom rörelsedrivande dotterbolag i Sverige, USA, Mexiko och Ryssland. Försäljning sker globalt, företrädesvis via distributörer med stöd av Boules egna lokala säljare och servicepersonal. Boule Diagnostics aktie är sedan 2011 noterad på Nasdaq Stockholm.*
 We are expanding our Applied Hematology team and are now looking for a Technical Writer!
   

  

 Boule is looking for a dedicated technical writer to join our team in producing high-quality documentation that contributes to the overall success of our products.
   

  

 The candidate must have a background within Life Science, with a particular interest and understanding of the clinical field and diagnostic sphere. Furthermore, the candidate must be fluent in English and possess excellent writing skills.
   

  

 The position will be a part of the Applied Hematology team at our headquarters in Spånga, Sweden, and will report to the Applied Hematology Manager.
   

  

 Scope
   

  

 As a technical writer for Boule you have the responsibility to develop technical documentation such as instructions and labels. You will also work closely with graphical designers to enable a strong visual and contextual message.
   

  

 Stakeholders
   

  

 The role includes engagement with multiple stakeholders such as laboratory staff, developers, quality and usability engineers, and product managers.
   

  

 Key Responsibilities
   

  

* Produce and maintain high-quality documentation that meets applicable standards and is appropriate for its intended audience
+ Write and maintain user manuals for our diagnostic systems
+ Write and maintain inserts and instructions for our reagents and consumables
+ Write and design labels and other product related documents/markings
+ Contribute to the preparation of training materials for laboratory staff and service engineers
+ In collaboration with UX designers and developers, contribute to the preparation of intuitive and understandable interface text and guides

* Create and maintain the information architecture
+ Maintain templates and modules of technical documents
+ Analyze existing and potential content, focusing on reuse and single-sourcing opportunities

* Review technical documents
* Participate and/or drive Change Control activities related to technical documentation
* Collaborate with internal stakeholders to obtain an in-depth understanding of the product and the documentation needed


 The Ideal Candidate
   

  

 Language
   

  

* Fluent in English, in speech and writing
* Swedish is preferred but not a requirement
* Other languages are a merit


 Education
   

  

* Higher education within Life Science


**Experience**
* High understanding of biology, diagnostics and medicine
* Minimum of 5 years experience from technical writing within the Life Science sphere
* Experience from Content Management Systems, preferably Paligo


 Additional merits
   

  

* Experience from working in a laboratory environment
* Experience from medical diagnostics regulations, especially IVDR and FDA
* Experience from global/international environment with multi-cultural influences


**Personal Qualifications**
* Pragmatic and works in a systematic, methodical and well-structured manner with ability to prioritize
* Ability to explain complex information in a simpler way, graphically and in text
* Attention to detail and consistency
* A good eye for layout and graphics
* High ability to work across functions – a true team player
* Energetic – ability to meet deadlines and push high priority projects through in a fast-paced environment


 Come and join a great team in an important and fun role, we offer a friendly environment with great employee benefits! Selection takes place continuously, so send your application right away!
   

  

 If you have any questions related to the role or the life at Boule, kindly connect with responsible department manager Sofié Olander at sofie.olander@boule.com or HR at HR@boule.se.

title: Technical Product Manager - Threat Protection-R-218826
description:
**Our Purpose**
 We work to connect and power an inclusive, digital economy that benefits everyone, everywhere by making transactions safe, simple, smart and accessible. Using secure data and networks, partnerships and passion, our innovations and solutions help individuals, financial institutions, governments and businesses realize their greatest potential. Our decency quotient, or DQ, drives our culture and everything we do inside and outside of our company. We cultivate a culture of inclusion for all employees that respects their individual strengths, views, and experiences. We believe that our differences enable us to be a better team – one that makes better decisions, drives innovation and delivers better business results.
   

  

****Title And Summary****
 Technical Product Manager - Threat Protection
   

  

**About The Role:**
 Mastercard Threat Protection is a suite of Platform as a Service cyber security products providing:
   

  

* DDOS mitigation
* Web Application Firewall
* Bot protection
* API protection


 Mastercard Threat Protection combines unique threat intelligence with cutting edge machine learning techniques to provide market-leading security solutions. You can read more about the product at https://baffinbay.com/our-solutions/
   

  

 Our Team Operates High-capacity, High-availability Infrastructure From Data Centers Globally. The Product Provides Mission-critical Cyber Security For Businesses Of All Sizes, Mitigating The Largest And Most Complicated DDOS And Application Layer Attacks. The Solution Offers Multiple Onboarding Methods:
   

  

* Layer 4 TCP / UDP proxy providing packet inspection and DDOS mitigation for all ports and protocols.
* Layer 7 / HTTP(S) reverse proxy for full HTTP inspection, providing application layer rate limiting, Web Application Firewall, bot protection and other application layer protections.
* a BGP routed service, which allows traffic to be routed via either the Layer 4 or Layer 7 proxies.


 We are seeking a Product Manager to join our dynamic team, helping shape the future evolution of Threat Protection and related products. You will work with colleagues around the world to help Mastercard position Threat Protection as a market-leading cybersecurity product.
   

  

 There may be a requirement for occasional travel.
   

  

**Experience:**
* We are open minded about your background; we are more interested in someone with relevant technical understanding rather than product management experience. Nevertheless, you still need to think through problems from a customer perspective and having some experience in the DDOS/WAF/networking space would be helpful.
* You should have a strong understanding of how the internet works (including all layers of the OSI model) and comfortable talking about mainstream internet technologies and standards including DNS, HTTP, TLS, TCP / UDP, BGP. Bonus points if you’ve read and appreciated RFCs.
* A broad grasp of internet security solutions and general cyber security best practices. Demonstrable interest in security and internet technologies.
* Excellent written and verbal communicator, comfortable communicating with technical and non-technical stakeholders.


**Responsibilities:**
* Work with Product Management colleagues to evolve and execute the product strategy.
* Collaborate with relevant stakeholders to prioritise the roadmap and ensure tasks are accurately defined, tracked, and executed.
* Regularly collaborate with delivery teams (including engineering, UX, architecture and program management), helping drive an effective product development lifecycle.
* Writing, contributing to or overseeing a range of written materials such as Product Requirements Documents (PRDs), customer support articles, release notes, etc.
* Collaborate with Engineering / Platform Operations to ensure the platform operates to market-leading resiliency and quality standards. Customers depend on the service operating effectively 24/7/365.
* Oversees relevant product documentation, both internal and external facing. Collaborate with the support team and technical writers to produce and update customer support documentation.
* Meeting with existing and prospective customers to understand their requirements and challenges, contributing to the roadmap.
* Carry out market research and competitive analyses to help shape product strategy.
* Collaborate with engineering, customer support and customer success teams to deal appropriately with service incidents, customer escalations and feature requests.
* Enable the sales, solutions engineering and marketing teams by producing appropriate materials and trainings. Support the technical aspects of RFP responses when necessary.


 #AI2
   

  

**Corporate Security Responsibility**
 All Activities Involving Access To Mastercard Assets, Information, And Networks Comes With An Inherent Risk To The Organization And, Therefore, It Is Expected That Every Person Working For, Or On Behalf Of, Mastercard Is Responsible For Information Security And Must:
   

  

* Abide by Mastercard’s security policies and practices;
* Ensure the confidentiality and integrity of the information being accessed;
* Report any suspected information security violation or breach, and
* Complete all periodic mandatory security trainings in accordance with Mastercard’s guidelines.


 R-218826

title: IIOT/Edge Data Platform Architect
description:
Seco Tools is growing rapidly, and we’re now looking for a driven and experienced IIOT/Edge Data Platform Architect who would be our technical subject matter expert of the creation of IT solution within the organization.
Your mission
 In this role, you will ensure the translation of business requirements into IT solutions to be implemented. Adding on to that, you will be entrusted to provide technical guidance in the design & implementation of IT solutions in support of business needs & strategy.
Your key responsibilities* Translate business and technical requirements into architectural blueprints to meet user/customer expectations & achieve business objectives aligned with agreed strategy and standards.
* Technology advisory embracing modern architectural paradigms to maximize architectural agility. Understand technology alternatives and when to apply.
* Leads evaluation, design and analysis for the implementation of a solutions architecture across a group of specific business applications or technologies.
* Creates architectural designs to guide and contextualize solution development across products and services.
* Use tools and methodologies to create representations for functions and user interface of desired product.
* Develop high-level product specifications with attention to system integration and feasibility.
* Document solution architecture design/blueprint and analysis work.
* Present pros/cons with different architectural alternatives.
* Collaborates with IT for security and architecture. Collaborates with Operations Processes & Systems for business needs.


About you
Fundamental Requirements* Bachelor’s degree in IT , Computer Engineering or Manufacturing
* Highly skilled in IT/IIoT/OT equipment, architecture and engineering.
* Additional knowledge of solutions such as OsiSoft or Microsoft Azure, as well as knowledge of Lean, Industry 4.0 or certificates within Solution Architecture.
* Further knowledge of communication protocols for obtaining data from machine tool controllers or machining in general, including modern CNC control systems are important skills
* Experience from IT/OT in a manufacturing industry, where your understanding of factory operations, such as production planning, execution and automation, are important factors for success.
* Leading transformation projects or program management in a global business is part of your track record..


Preferred Knowledge & Skills* Engineering and software architecture design.
* Fundamental data security, operating systems & database management. NIST and ZERO TRUST
* Infrastructure, Web platforms & cloud development.
* Computer hardware and software knowledge as below
* Experience of machine protocols (e.g. MTConnect, OPC-UA, and Modbus)
* Experience working with SCADA , IIoT , MES , Digital Twin, PLM , ERP and CRM
* Experience with sensors and gateways
* knowledge of OCI Model, Front-end: .Net
* Experience of machine protocols: MTConnect, OPC-UA, Modbus, OPCUA, and IEC 61850
* Knowlage about Cloud: Microsoft Azure (Event Grid, IoT Edge, Data Lake, IoT Hub, Azure Function, API Management)
* Knowlage about Data bases: Data ingestion, SQL, Azure Data Lake
* Knowledge about wired and wireless Networking
* Knowledge of coding languages

  

Personality traits* You are a genuine teamplayer and an innovator who always have one eye on the latest development in the world of technology.
* A strategic mind that lets you to think several steps ahead and see how proposed changes could benefit or impact our business.
* You know how to turn complex problems and large amounts of data into actions, and as a goal-oriented and creative doer, you bring ideas and initiatives into real development.
* You’re also a role model for sharing best practices - encouraging an open environment where everyone can learn from each other and grow.
* We work in a global setting, which need advanced skills in English, both in speaking and in writing. Having additional language is a plus.


ABOUT US
Seco Tools  

Seco Tools is a people company in the machining business. For over 80 years, we have been more than just a cutting tool provider. Our tools help build planes, trains, automobiles, and everything else around us. Your phone case? The molds are cut and created by our tools. The lenses in the glasses you wear? Cut by our tools. The Chicago Bean in Millennium Park was created by our tools. It's what we do, we're good at it and proud of it! We make a difference in people's lives, and we want you to be a difference maker too.  

The corporate culture empowers employees through the shared values: Passion for our customers, Family Spirit, and Personal commitment. Seco Tools has presence in more than 50 countries and employs about 5000 people.  

Seco Tools, a subsidy of Sandvik is an equal opportunity/affirmative action employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to sex, gender identity, sexual orientation, race, color, religion, national origin, disability, protected Veteran status, age, or any other characteristic protected by law. Any applicant who, because of a disability, needs accommodation or assistance in completing an application or at any time during the application process should contact Human Resources at hrsolutions.us@sandvik.com. Sandvik also provides reasonable accommodations to employees with disabilities consistent with its obligations under the law.
